function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of contamination if the sensor network is not properly sanitized or maintained, leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the built environment, resulting in occupant health issues and reduced productivity.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization and maintenance of the sensor network, along with clear guidelines for handling and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"UV-C light sanitization systems, antimicrobial coatings for sensor surfaces.","People":"Building occupants, facility maintenance staff, sensor network administrators.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management companies, sensor network manufacturers."}]}
